description: Number of k, 1 <= k <= n, where {k (n+1-k) + 1} is prime.
example: For n = 7, 2*6 + 1, 4*4 + 1 and 6*2 + 1 are prime, so a(7) = 3.
maple: A057458 := proc(n)    a := 0 ;    for k from 1 to n do        if isprime(1+k*(n+1-k)) then            a := a+1 ;        end if;    end do:    a;end proc:seq(A057458(n),n=1..80) ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Jan 28 2014
author: _Leroy Quet_, Sep 26 2000
